title: Best of The Program | Guest: Andy Ngo | 2/5/21
description:
Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene was removed from her committee assignments. Glenn explains why people start believing in conspiracy theories and argues we’re living through “the Bubba Effect." Journalist Andy Ngo reviews his new book “Unmasked," his flight to England, and how Antifa became the radical group it is today. A mom sacrificed her own life to save her daughter from hitmen by pretending to be her.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
